name: Blinky (itch)
description:
Blinky is a game about a fox who wants to rescue the rabbits from the evil magicians of the circus.

Project is my second game just programmed by me, using the Unity3D platform.

The arts and sounds are from the OpenGameArt community and the Unity Asset Store.

Project is part of an academic study on software modeling with Object-Process Methodology (OPM). In the future, the link will be made available.
